original: Yaṁ tena bhagavatā jānatā passatā arahatā sammāsambuddhena methunaṁ dhammaṁ paṭisevanapaccayā pārājikaṁ kattha paññattaṁ, kaṁ ārabbha, kismiṁ vatthusmiṁ …pe…
analyzed: yam tena bhagavatā jānatā passatā arahatā sammāsambuddhena methunam dhammam paṭisevana paccayā pārājikam kattha paññatta kam ārabbha kismim vatthusmim pe

original: Yaṁ tena bhagavatā jānatā passatā arahatā sammāsambuddhena methunaṁ dhammaṁ paṭisevanapaccayā pārājikaṁ kattha paññattanti?
analyzed: yam tena bhagavatā jānatā passatā arahatā sammāsambuddhena methunam dhammam paṭisevana paccayā pārājikam kattha paññattanti

original: Sudinno kalandaputto purāṇadutiyikāya methunaṁ dhammaṁ paṭisevi, tasmiṁ vatthusmiṁ.
analyzed: sudinnaḥ kalanda putto purāṇa dutiyikāya methunam dhammam paṭisevi tasmim vatthusmi
atthi tattha paññatti anupaññatti anuppanna paññatti iti
pañcannam pātimokkha uddesānam katthogadham kattha pariyāpannanti
sattannam āpatti kkhandhānam katamaḥ āpatti kkhandhaḥ ti
channam āpatti samuṭṭhānānam katihi samuṭṭhānehi samuṭṭhāti iti

original: kāyato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhāti, na vācato …pe…
analyzed: kāyataḥ ca cittataḥ ca samuṭṭhāti na vācataḥ pe

original: Yaṁ tena bhagavatā jānatā passatā arahatā sammāsambuddhena adinnaṁ ādiyanapaccayā pārājikaṁ kattha paññattanti?
analyzed: yam tena bhagavatā jānatā passatā arahatā sammāsambuddhena adinnam ādiyana paccayā pārājikam kattha paññattanti

original: Dhaniyo kumbhakāraputto rañño dārūni adinnaṁ ādiyi, tasmiṁ vatthusmiṁ.
analyzed: dhaniyaḥ kumbhakāra putto raññaḥ dārūni adinnam ādiyi tasmim vatthusmi
channam āpatti samuṭṭhānānam tīhi samuṭṭhānehi samuṭṭhāti

original: siyā kāyato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhāti, na vācato;
analyzed: siyā kāyataḥ ca cittataḥ ca samuṭṭhāti na vācataḥ

original: siyā vācato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhāti, na kāyato;
analyzed: siyā vācataḥ ca cittataḥ ca samuṭṭhāti na kāyataḥ

original: siyā kāyato ca vācato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhāti …pe….
analyzed: siyā kāyataḥ ca vācataḥ ca cittataḥ ca samuṭṭhāti pe

original: Sañcicca manussaviggahaṁ jīvitā voropanapaccayā pārājikaṁ kattha paññattanti?
analyzed: sañcicca manussa viggaham jīvitā voropana paccayā pārājikam kattha paññattanti

original: Sambahulā bhikkhū aññamaññaṁ jīvitā voropesuṁ, tasmiṁ vatthusmiṁ.
analyzed: sambahulāḥ bhikkhū aññamaññam jīvitā voropesu tasmim vatthusmi
channam āpatti samuṭṭhānānam tīhi samuṭṭhānehi samuṭṭhāti

original: siyā kāyato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhāti, na vācato;
analyzed: siyā kāyataḥ ca cittataḥ ca samuṭṭhāti na vācataḥ

original: siyā vācato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhāti, na kāyato;

analyzed: siyā kāyataḥ ca vācataḥ ca cittataḥ ca samuṭṭhāti pe

original: Asantaṁ abhūtaṁ uttarimanussadhammaṁ ullapanapaccayā pārājikaṁ kattha paññattanti?
analyzed: asantam abhūtam uttari manussa dhammam ullapana paccayā pārājikam kattha paññattanti

original: Vaggumudātīriyā bhikkhū gihīnaṁ aññamaññassa uttarimanussadhammassa vaṇṇaṁ bhāsiṁsu, tasmiṁ vatthusmiṁ.
analyzed: vaggumudātīriyāḥ bhikkhū gihīnam aññamaññassa uttari manussa dhammassa vaṇṇam bhāsisu tasmim vatthusmi
channam āpatti samuṭṭhānānam tīhi samuṭṭhānehi samuṭṭhāti

original: siyā kāyato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhāti, na vācato;
analyzed: siyā kāyataḥ ca cittataḥ ca samuṭṭhāti na vācataḥ

original: siyā vācato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhāti, na kāyato;
analyzed: siyā vācataḥ ca cittataḥ ca samuṭṭhāti na kāyataḥ

original: siyā kāyato ca vācato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhāti …pe….
analyzed: siyā kāyataḥ ca vācataḥ ca cittataḥ ca samuṭṭhāti pe

original: Yaṁ tena bhagavatā jānatā passatā arahatā sammāsambuddhena upakkamitvā asuciṁ mocanapaccayā saṅghādiseso kattha paññatto, kaṁ ārabbha, kismiṁ vatthusmiṁ …pe…
analyzed: yam tena bhagavatā jānatā passatā arahatā sammāsambuddhena upakkamitvā asucim mocana paccayā saṅgha ādiseso kattha paññattaḥ kam ārabbha kismim vatthusmim pe

original: Yaṁ tena bhagavatā jānatā passatā arahatā sammāsambuddhena upakkamitvā asuciṁ mocanapaccayā saṅghādiseso kattha paññattoti?
analyzed: yam tena bhagavatā jānatā passatā arahatā sammāsambuddhena upakkamitvā asucim mocana paccayā saṅgha ādisesaḥ kattha paññatto ti

original: Āyasmā seyyasako upakkamitvā asuciṁ mocesi, tasmiṁ vatthusmiṁ.
analyzed: āyasmā seyyasako upakkamitvā asucim mocesi tasmim vatthusmi
atthi tattha paññatti anupaññatti anuppanna paññatti iti

sattannam āpatti kkhandhānam katamaḥ āpatti kkhandhaḥ ti

analyzed: mātugāmena saddhim kāya sasaggam samāpajjana paccayā saṅgha ādiseso kattha paññatto ti

original: Mātugāmaṁ duṭṭhullāhi vācāhi obhāsanapaccayā saṅghādiseso kattha paññattoti?
analyzed: mātugāmam duṭṭhullāhi vācāhi obhāsana paccayā saṅgha ādiseso kattha paññatto ti

original: Āyasmā udāyī mātugāmaṁ duṭṭhullāhi vācāhi obhāsi, tasmiṁ vatthusmiṁ.
analyzed: āyasmai udāyī mātugāmam duṭṭhullāhi vācāhi tasmin vatthusmi

original: Mātugāmassa santike attakāmapāricariyāya vaṇṇaṁ bhāsanapaccayā saṅghādiseso kattha paññattoti?
analyzed: mātu gāmassa santike atta kāma pāricariyāya vaṇṇam bhāsana paccayā saṅgha ādiseso kattha paññatto ti

original: Āyasmā udāyī mātugāmassa santike attakāmapāricariyāya vaṇṇaṁ bhāsi, tasmiṁ vatthusmiṁ.
analyzed: āyasmai udāyī mātugāmassa santike atta kāma pāricariyāya vaṇṇam bhāsi tasmim vatthusmi
channam āpatti samuṭṭhānānam tīhi samuṭṭhānehi samuṭṭhāti pe

original: Āyasmā udāyī sañcarittaṁ samāpajji, tasmiṁ vatthusmiṁ.
analyzed: āyasmai udāyī sañcarittam samāpajji tasmin vatthusmi

analyzed: siyā kāyataḥ ca cittataḥ ca samuṭṭhāti na vācataḥ

original: siyā vācato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhāti, na kāyato;
analyzed: siyā vācataḥ ca cittataḥ ca samuṭṭhāti na kāyataḥ

original: siyā kāyato ca vācato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhāti …pe….
analyzed: siyā kāyataḥ ca vācataḥ ca cittataḥ ca samuṭṭhāti pe

original: Saññācikāya kuṭiṁ kārāpanapaccayā saṅghādiseso kattha paññattoti?
analyzed: kuṭim kārāpana paccayā saṅgha ādiseso kattha paññatto ti

original: Āḷavakā bhikkhū saññācikāya kuṭiyo kārāpesuṁ, tasmiṁ vatthusmiṁ.
analyzed: āḷavakāḥ bhikkhū saññācikāya kuṭiyaḥ kārāpesu tasmim vatthusmi
channam āpatti samuṭṭhānānam chahi samuṭṭhānehi samuṭṭhāti pe

original: Mahallakaṁ vihāraṁ kārāpanapaccayā saṅghādiseso kattha paññattoti?
analyzed: mahallakam vihāram kārāpana paccayā saṅgha ādiseso kattha paññatto ti

original: Āyasmā channo vihāravatthuṁ sodhento aññataraṁ cetiyarukkhaṁ chedāpesi, tasmiṁ vatthusmiṁ.
analyzed: āyasmā channaḥ vihāra vatthum sodhentaḥ aññataram cetiya rukkham chedāpesi tasmim vatthusmi
channam āpatti samuṭṭhānānam chahi samuṭṭhānehi samuṭṭhāti pe

original: Bhikkhuṁ amūlakena pārājikena dhammena anuddhaṁsanapaccayā saṅghādiseso kattha paññattoti?
analyzed: bhikkhum amūlakena pārājikena dhammena an uddhasana paccayā saṅgha ādiseso kattha paññatto ti

original: Mettiyabhūmajakā bhikkhū āyasmantaṁ dabbaṁ mallaputtaṁ amūlakena pārājikena dhammena anuddhaṁsesuṁ, tasmiṁ vatthusmiṁ.
analyzed: mettiyabhūmajakāḥ bhikkhū āyasmantam dabbam mallaputtam amūlakena pārājikena dhammena anuddhasesu tasmim vatthusmi
channam āpatti samuṭṭhānānam tīhi samuṭṭhānehi samuṭṭhāti pe

original: Bhikkhuṁ aññabhāgiyassa adhikaraṇassa kiñcidesaṁ lesamattaṁ upādāya pārājikena dhammena anuddhaṁsanapaccayā saṅghādiseso kattha paññattoti?
analyzed: bhikkhum aññabhāgiyassa adhikaraṇassa kiñci desam lesa mattam upādāya pārājikena dhammena an uddhasana paccayā saṅgha ādiseso kattha paññatto ti

original: Mettiyabhūmajakā bhikkhū āyasmantaṁ dabbaṁ mallaputtaṁ aññabhāgiyassa adhikaraṇassa kiñci desaṁ lesamattaṁ upādāya pārājikena dhammena anuddhaṁsesuṁ, tasmiṁ vatthusmiṁ.
analyzed: mettiyabhūmajakāḥ bhikkhū āyasmantam dabbam malla puttam aññabhāgiyassa adhikaraṇassa kiñci desam lesa mattam upādāya pārājikena dhammena anuddhasesu tasmim vatthusmi
channam āpatti samuṭṭhānānam tīhi samuṭṭhānehi samuṭṭhāti pe

original: Saṅghabhedakassa bhikkhuno yāvatatiyaṁ samanubhāsanāya na paṭinissajjanapaccayā saṅghādiseso kattha paññattoti?
analyzed: saṅgha bhedakassa bhikkhuno yāvatatiyam samanubhāsanāya na paṭinissajjana paccayā saṅgha ādiseso kattha paññatto ti

original: Devadatto samaggassa saṅghassa bhedāya parakkami, tasmiṁ vatthusmiṁ.
analyzed: devadatto samaggassa saṅghassa bhedāya parakkami tasmim vatthusmi
channam āpatti samuṭṭhānānam ekena samuṭṭhānena samuṭṭhāti

original: kāyato ca vācato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhāti …pe….
analyzed: kāyataḥ ca vācataḥ ca cittataḥ ca samuṭṭhāti pe

original: Bhedakānuvattakānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ yāvatatiyaṁ samanubhāsanāya na paṭinissajjanapaccayā saṅghādiseso kattha paññattoti?
analyzed: bhedaka anuvattakānam bhikkhūnam yāvatatiyam samanubhāsanāya na paṭinissajjana paccayā saṅgha ādiseso kattha paññattaḥ ti

original: Sambahulā bhikkhū devadattassa saṅghabhedāya parakkamantassa anuvattakā ahesuṁ vaggavādakā, tasmiṁ vatthusmiṁ.
analyzed: sambahulāḥ bhikkhū devadattassa saṅgha bhedāya parakkamantassa anuvattakāḥ ahesum vagga vādakā tasmim vatthusmi
channam āpatti samuṭṭhānānam ekena samuṭṭhānena samuṭṭhāti

original: kāyato ca vācato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhāti …pe….
analyzed: kāyataḥ ca vācataḥ ca cittataḥ ca samuṭṭhāti pe

original: Dubbacassa bhikkhuno yāvatatiyaṁ samanubhāsanāya na paṭinissajjanapaccayā saṅghādiseso kattha paññattoti?
analyzed: dubbacassa bhikkhuno yāvatatiyam samanubhāsanāya na paṭinissajjana paccayā saṅgha ādiseso kattha paññatto ti

original: Āyasmā channo bhikkhūhi sahadhammikaṁ vuccamāno attānaṁ avacanīyaṁ akāsi, tasmiṁ vatthusmiṁ.
analyzed: āyasmā channaḥ bhikkhūhi sahadhammikam vuccamānaḥ attānam avacanīyam akāsi tasmim vatthusmi
channam āpatti samuṭṭhānānam ekena samuṭṭhānena samuṭṭhāti

original: kāyato ca vācato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhāti …pe….
analyzed: kāyataḥ ca vācataḥ ca cittataḥ ca samuṭṭhāti pe

original: Kuladūsakassa bhikkhuno yāvatatiyaṁ samanubhāsanāya na paṭinissajjanapaccayā saṅghādiseso kattha paññattoti?
analyzed: kula dūsakassa bhikkhuno yāvatatiyam samanubhāsanāya na paṭinissajjana paccayā saṅgha ādiseso kattha paññatto ti

original: Assajipunabbasukā bhikkhū saṅghena pabbājanīyakammakatā bhikkhū chandagāmitā dosagāmitā mohagāmitā bhayagāmitā pāpesuṁ, tasmiṁ vatthusmiṁ.
analyzed: assajipu nabbasukāḥ bhikkhū saṅghena pabbājanīya kamma katāḥ bhikkhū chanda gāmi tā dosa gāmi tā moha gāmi tā bhaya gāmi tā pāpesu tasmim vatthusmi
channam āpatti samuṭṭhānānam ekena samuṭṭhānena samuṭṭhāti

original: kāyato ca vācato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhāti …pe….
analyzed: kāyataḥ ca vācataḥ ca cittataḥ ca samuṭṭhāti pe

original: Anādariyaṁ paṭicca udake uccāraṁ vā passāvaṁ vā kheḷaṁ vā karaṇapaccayā dukkaṭaṁ kattha paññattanti?
analyzed: anādariyam paṭicca udake uccāram vā passāvam vā kheḷam vā karaṇa paccayā dukkaṭam kattha paññattanti

original: Chabbaggiyā bhikkhū udake uccārampi passāvampi kheḷampi akaṁsu, tasmiṁ vatthusmiṁ.
analyzed: chabbaggiyāḥ bhikkhū udake uccārampi passāvampi kheḍampi tasmim vatthusmi
